pullrequest.title: Ign math integration with common library, part 1

content.raw:
I'd prefer to not change both the function name and parameter types with the ignition::math conversion. It will be easier for people to simply change types instead of changing both types and function names. So, for the ignition math changes we are trying to only change types.

There are caveats when the function name has to change due to symbol conflicts. These are unavoidable, but should be kept to a minimum.
content.html:
I'd prefer to not change both the function name and parameter types with the ignition::math conversion. It will be easier for people to simply change types instead of changing both types and function names. So, for the ignition math changes we are trying to only change types.

There are caveats when the function name has to change due to symbol conflicts. These are unavoidable, but should be kept to a minimum.
